author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...RAYMOND APPROACHING BAJA CALIFORNIA SUR... ...HEAVY RAINS AND TROPICAL STORM CONDITIONS EXPECTED THERE ON SATURDAY...
summary: ...RAYMOND APPROACHING BAJA CALIFORNIA SUR... ...HEAVY RAINS AND TROPICAL STORM CONDITIONS EXPECTED THERE ON SATURDAY... As of 8:00 PM MST Fri Oct 10 the center of Raymond was located near 20.2, -107.7 with movement NW at 18 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1000 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Raymond (EP2/EP172025)
